Reviews.Title: Excellent basic phone!
Reviews.Author: Cheri
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone as a downgrade from a smartphone to a basic phone. I had owned this phone in the past and it was just as I remembered it to be. Simple and easy to use, yet very elegant looking. I must admit that purple is my favorite color and the first thing that attracted me to this phone when I saw it in the Verizon store a few years ago. But the fact that it is a solid sturdy quality phone makes it an even better purchase. I had no problem what so ever activating this phone on my existing Verizon account.. I recommend this phone to anyone needing a nice quality basic phone.I have read reviews that say battery life is bad, but I have had no problem with that as of yet I am still on my first charge after two days and it reads almost a full charge still. Sound quality is great during calls, clear and crisp on my end and no complaint from the other end when I asked. I don't really use my phone as a camera so the camera feature is not as important to me.

Reviews.Title: Good as kids emergency phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I feel more secure having my grade level child carry a phone that is solely used when he needs to, either when his pickup rides didn't show up or other emergencies after school or on family/school field trips. This phone is one of the few left that is simple, works on current Verizon network, and also allow me to turn on location tracking when I need to. My son likes the purple color. The chrome accent/trim gives a real handsome look overall...in my opinion.Since it is 99% on standby in vibrate mode (didn't want to ring in classroom), the phone can last a week on a full battery charge. The re-charging of the battery when low, took less than one hour!

Reviews.Title: no instructions on using phone
Reviews.Author: Gerry L. Jenkins
Reviews.Content: phone seems ok in appearence but have not used it yet because no instructions were supplied (book)there were no statements stating phone came without instructions

Reviews.Title: Battery
Reviews.Author: Disappointed in WA
Reviews.Content: The phone was a replacement for an old one I had that I loved. The battery that came with it was crap.Could have returned it but hey by the time I paid shipping I just bought a new one.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: studybug
Reviews.Content: the design fits in my palms perfectly. the colors, purple and silver are great together. battery holds charge for maximum of 3 days. the only down side is that the memory card is in underneath the battery, i don't like to take out the battery when trying to take out the memory card.

Reviews.Title: No app software available
Reviews.Author: baron22
Reviews.Content: Received phone, activated it then went to download contacts using Verizon back-up assistant. Found out Verizon no longer supports any app software for this phone.........so no apps ever. Other than that the phone works fine but it looks like talking is all anyone will ever be able to use it for. Maybe seller didn't know about the software app issue. I ordered this phone because I have family members who also have this phone and I knew it would receive a signal where I live which can be a real problem. I will keep the phone for that reason but the selling price definitely way too high considering the app software issue.

Reviews.Title: ........stinks
Reviews.Author: Vickie "/J.Walker"
Reviews.Content: This phone was good, but a month later, when i shut it , it turns it off by itself and restarts, itself and all that, soooooo ezxcatly how new is this? im DEF! done buying phones from amazon cell phone sellers!.....

Reviews.Title: Great phone for mom
Reviews.Author: Lahiru
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone for somebody who is not technologically advanced but still appreciate a goodsolid phone. I bought a refurbished one and it was just like the brand new one. The phone haveall the features to make phone calls and write a few texts. Don't expect anything more, it's just agood basic phone.

Reviews.Title: awesome classic phone
Reviews.Author: kim gray
Reviews.Content: this was just what I was looking for and arrived as promised. I have no complaints and love the purple phone!

Reviews.Title: buyer beware
Reviews.Author: readinglarge
Reviews.Content: The phone was useless after having activated wouldn't  access the web or picture messages and was sent with dead battery which was replaced by two more dead batteries.this was not an Amazon purchase as I have nothing but good things to say about my Amazon purchases.this was a seller on here.buyer beware when it comes to buying from INDY

Reviews.Title: Motorola phone (not all purple)
Reviews.Author: Marty M.
Reviews.Content: Got this for my daughter.  Her old one died.  Hard to find any kind of clamshells she likes, so we went back to what she had.  Unfortunately, the picture does not match what we got.  Only the inner face is purple, not the whole phone as shown and was what her original was.

Reviews.Title: Very good phone
Reviews.Author: Ricky Vendramini
Reviews.Content: exactly what I wanted, works great, very happy, I would buy the same kind again, I would recommend it to anyone that needs a good low priced flip phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone~
Reviews.Author: Debbie DeShazo
Reviews.Content: Great Phone for those who want just the basics- call, receive calls, take photo's and texting...Just the right sixe too-It's a great starter phone:)

Reviews.Title: GREAT SERVICE!!!
Reviews.Author: Lups
Reviews.Content: I purchased a used phone. Worked well and in decent condition for an old used phone. Battery kept dying. I received two more batteries and they were just not holding a lint of charge. However, this guy is AWESOME! I received the best customer service I've had so far through Amazon. I returned for free no questions asked. TOTAL reimbursement within a day. I will buy again, different phone next time.

Reviews.Title: Horrible phone
Reviews.Author: Shellb
Reviews.Content: The phone is a very BASIC phone and it will not allow you to access any email or social networks.

Reviews.Title: Great flip phone
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Rivera
Reviews.Content: The only issue is that the spring on the phone will eventually wear and the phone will no longer stay open or closed.  Other then that a good phone for it's time.

Reviews.Title: Eh
Reviews.Author: Briana Lewis
Reviews.Content: It is everything it said it would be, it has scratches and chips but it said it would... a little pricey for the condition if you ask me, but all in all it works good.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: squirmy
Reviews.Content: this is the only phone i will use. just bought another one to have when mine breaks. have not used it yet

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Cathanne Higgins
Reviews.Content: I've been a Motorola flip phone fan for many years.  I'm not into today's smart phones, so being able to purchase two back ups for my current phone will keep me connected for many years to come.FYI ---- Having bought two used phones, I went to my local Verizon store to make sure the serial numbers were not on a stolen list, and they checked out fine.  Thank you for a quality purchase.

Reviews.Title: Limited Battery life. Not a fancy phone but it works.
Reviews.Author: Dave G.
Reviews.Content: Limited Battery life. Not a fancy phone but it works. Limited Battery life. Not a fancy phone but it works.

Reviews.Title: bought for my preteen
Reviews.Author: Debra Hernandez
Reviews.Content: Great basic starter phone for making and calls and texting.long battery life, and it is a nice and sleek style.does not need a data package so that is a plus!

Reviews.Title: Good but battery doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Russell
Reviews.Content: Looks great, and is in great condition, but the battery only lasts about 10 minutes. Other than that it is great.

Reviews.Title: Yes
Reviews.Author: Michael Chaisson
Reviews.Content: yes i like itThe back it losebut i can deal with thatand like the color of itThanksMichael C

Reviews.Title: Cute purple phone
Reviews.Author: April Bluck
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my mom who just wanted a simple basic phone.  She is hard of hearing and the ring tones are a bit difficult for her to hear at times.  This phone is just a bit smaller than I expected but overall she is pleased with it.  We had no difficulty activating it with Verizon.

Reviews.Title: Purple Power
Reviews.Author: Francesca "Francesca"
Reviews.Content: After many years of loyal service my Moto W755 had to be retired. I don't need or like all of the multipurpose phones..I just needed my small, simple, purple telephone. This seller had exactly what I was hoping to find and it was in excellent condition. So now I have the twin to my original phone. The seller's listing and integrity was spot-on. It arrived quickly and thoughtfully packed.  It was a pleasure to do business was this seller.

Reviews.Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE my simple flip phone
Reviews.Author: Kelly Hunter
Reviews.Content: I actually purchased this phone for my mom. I bought the same phone for myself about a month ago, she saw it, loved it, so I bought her one. Color is gorgeous,phone is simple to use. Who cares if it's an "old" phone or worse "old people phone". I like that when it rings, I just have to open it and say hello, as opposed to tapping a screen, or sliding a widget around. I've had a lot of phones, and this one is my favorite! Sure, I can afford an Iphone or something similiar, but I prefer simpler times and things. It makes and receives calls,it texts,it has internet, it has everything I need :-)Shipping was EXTREMELY fast,price was excellent. I'm happy with the entire experience!

Reviews.Title: Motorola Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Lynn E. Appell
Reviews.Content: The cell phone is great.  However, there has been a problem transferring my contact list over to the new phone.  Verizon is working the programming for this malfunction.

Reviews.Title: Reliable, basic phone with a little bit of style.
Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone for years.  Had to go back to using it when my newer phone died a sad, watery death.  It's been very reliable and easy to use.  And I love the purple color, which adds a bit of personality to the phone.  I'm on my second cheap replacement battery.  The original lasted 2-3 years, but cost about $40.  The cheap one I got on Amazon cost only about $6 and lasts about 6-8 months.

Reviews.Title: Motorola W755 for Verizon (Purple)
Reviews.Author: penntwin
Reviews.Content: I paid to have it sent in 3 - 5 days, but I received it in one day.  Great Service!!!

Reviews.Title: good deal
Reviews.Author: a shame
Reviews.Content: this is the best phone deal ive ever seen you need to try these guys out you get more than what you pay for and thell go a long way good buisness practices
